item.title: coursera m2w2p
item.description: op utils import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import h5py import scipy.io import sklearn import sklearn.datasets def sigmoid(x): """ Compute the sigmoid of x Arguments: x -- A scalar or numpy array of any size. Return: s -- sigmoid(x) """ s = 1/(1+np.exp(-x)) return s def relu(x): """ Compute the relu of x Arguments: x -- A scalar or numpy array of any size. Return: s -- relu(x) """ s = np.
